text: Potton is a town and civil parish in Bedfordshire, England. It is about from Bedford. ==Population== As of 2001, 4,473 people lived in Potton. As of the 2001 census, 95.5% of residents in Potton were British. 73.9% were Christian, 1.3% followed another religion and 24.9% said no religion. Category:Towns in Bedfordshire Category:Civil parishes in Bedfordshire
title: Potton
